ai-mn148:1.2_0: At one time the Buddha was staying near Sāvatthī in Jeta’s Grove, Anāthapiṇḍika’s monastery.
ai-mn148:2.1_0: “Mendicants, I shall teach you the Dhamma that’s good in the beginning, good in the middle, and good in the end, meaningful and well-phrased. And I shall reveal a spiritual practice that’s entirely full and pure, namely,
ai-mn148:2.3_0: listen and pay close attention, I will speak.”
ai-mn148:3.1_0: “The six interior sense fields should be understood. The six exterior sense fields should be understood. The six classes of consciousness should be understood. The six classes of contact should be understood. The six classes of feeling should be understood. The six classes of craving should be understood.
ai-mn148:4.1_0: ‘The six interior sense fields should be understood.’
ai-mn148:4.2_0: That’s what I said, but why did I say it?
ai-mn148:4.3_0: There are the sense fields of the eye, ear, nose, tongue, body, and mind.
ai-mn148:4.4_0: ‘The six interior sense fields should be understood.’
ai-mn148:4.5_0: That's why I said what I said.
ai-mn148:4.6_0: This is the first set of six.
ai-mn148:5.1_0: ‘The six exterior sense fields should be understood.’
ai-mn148:5.2_0: That’s what I said, but why did I say it?
ai-mn148:5.3_0: sights, sounds, smells, tastes, touches, and thoughts.
ai-mn148:5.4_0: ‘The six exterior sense fields should be understood.’
ai-mn148:5.5_0: That's why I said what I said.
ai-mn148:5.6_0: This is the second set of six.
ai-mn148:6.1_0: ‘The six classes of consciousness should be understood.’
ai-mn148:6.2_0: That’s what I said, but why did I say it?
ai-mn148:6.3_0: Eye consciousness arises dependent on the eye and sights.
ai-mn148:6.4_0: Ear consciousness arises dependent on the ear and sounds.
ai-mn148:6.5_0: Nose consciousness arises dependent on the nose and smells.
ai-mn148:6.6_0: Tongue consciousness arises dependent on the tongue and tastes.
ai-mn148:6.7_0: Body consciousness arises dependent on the body and touches.
ai-mn148:6.8_0: Mind consciousness arises dependent on the mind and thoughts.
ai-mn148:6.9_0: ‘The six classes of consciousness should be understood.’
ai-mn148:6.10_0: That's why I said what I said.
ai-mn148:6.11_0: This is the third set of six.
ai-mn148:7.1_0: ‘The six classes of contact should be understood.’
ai-mn148:7.2_0: That’s what I said, but why did I say it?
ai-mn148:7.3_0: Eye consciousness arises dependent on the eye and sights. The meeting of the three is contact.
ai-mn148:7.4_0: Ear consciousness arises dependent on the ear and sounds. The meeting of the three is contact.
ai-mn148:7.5_0: Nose consciousness arises dependent on the nose and smells. The meeting of the three is contact.
ai-mn148:7.6_0: Tongue consciousness arises dependent on the tongue and tastes. The meeting of the three is contact.
ai-mn148:7.7_0: Body consciousness arises dependent on the body and touches. The meeting of the three is contact.
ai-mn148:7.8_0: Mind consciousness arises dependent on the mind and thoughts. The meeting of the three is contact.
ai-mn148:7.9_0: ‘The six classes of contact should be understood.’
ai-mn148:7.10_0: That's why I said what I said.
ai-mn148:7.11_0: This is the fourth set of six.
ai-mn148:8.2_0: That’s what I said, but why did I say it?
ai-mn148:8.3_0: Eye consciousness arises dependent on the eye and sights. The meeting of the three is contact. Contact is a condition for feeling.
ai-mn148:8.4_0: Ear consciousness arises dependent on the ear and sounds. The meeting of the three is contact. Contact is a condition for feeling.
ai-mn148:8.5_0: Nose consciousness arises dependent on the nose and smells. The meeting of the three is contact. Contact is a condition for feeling.
ai-mn148:8.6_0: Tongue consciousness arises dependent on the tongue and tastes. The meeting of the three is contact. Contact is a condition for feeling.
ai-mn148:8.7_0: Body consciousness arises dependent on the body and touches. The meeting of the three is contact. Contact is a condition for feeling.
ai-mn148:8.8_0: Mind consciousness arises dependent on the mind and thoughts. The meeting of the three is contact. Contact is a condition for feeling.
ai-mn148:8.10_0: That's why I said what I said.
ai-mn148:8.11_0: This is the fifth set of six.
ai-mn148:9.1_0: ‘The six classes of craving should be understood.’
ai-mn148:9.2_0: That’s what I said, but why did I say it?
ai-mn148:9.3_0: Eye consciousness arises dependent on the eye and sights. The meeting of the three is contact. Contact is a condition for feeling. Feeling is a condition for craving.
ai-mn148:9.8_0: Mind consciousness arises dependent on the mind and thoughts. The meeting of the three is contact. Contact is a condition for feeling. Feeling is a condition for craving.
ai-mn148:9.9_0: ‘The six classes of craving should be understood.’
ai-mn148:9.10_0: That's why I said what I said.
ai-mn148:9.11_0: This is the sixth set of six.
ai-mn148:10.1_0: If anyone says, ‘the eye is self,’ that is not tenable.
ai-mn148:10.2_0: The arising and vanishing of the eye is evident,
ai-mn148:10.3_0: But my arising and vanishing is evident, ‘the arising is evident, this is its vanishing.’
ai-mn148:10.6_0: So the eye is not self.
ai-mn148:10.7_0: If anyone says, ‘sights are self,’ that is not tenable.
ai-mn148:10.8_0: The arising and vanishing of sights is evident,
ai-mn148:10.9_0: But my arising and vanishing is evident, ‘the arising is evident, this is its vanishing.’
ai-mn148:10.12_0: So the eye is not self and sights are not self.
ai-mn148:10.13_0: If anyone says, ‘eye consciousness is self,’ that is not tenable.
ai-mn148:10.14_0: The arising and vanishing of eye consciousness is evident,
ai-mn148:10.15_0: But my arising and vanishing is evident, ‘the arising is evident, this is its vanishing.’
ai-mn148:10.18_0: So the eye, sights, and eye consciousness are not self.
ai-mn148:10.19_0: If anyone says, ‘eye contact is self,’ that is not tenable.
ai-mn148:10.20_0: The arising and vanishing of eye contact is evident,
ai-mn148:10.21_0: But my arising and vanishing is evident, ‘the arising is evident, this is its vanishing.’
ai-mn148:10.24_0: So the eye, sights, eye consciousness, and eye contact are not self.
ai-mn148:10.25_0: If anyone says, ‘feeling is self,’ that is not tenable.
ai-mn148:10.26_0: The arising and vanishing of feeling is evident,
ai-mn148:10.27_0: But my arising and vanishing is evident, ‘the arising is evident, this is its vanishing.’
ai-mn148:10.30_0: So the eye, sights, eye consciousness, eye contact, and feeling are not self.
ai-mn148:10.31_0: If anyone says, ‘craving is self,’ that is not tenable.
ai-mn148:10.32_0: The arising and vanishing of craving is evident,
ai-mn148:10.33_0: But my arising and vanishing is evident, ‘the arising is evident, this is its vanishing.’
ai-mn148:10.36_0: So the eye, sights, eye consciousness, eye contact, feeling, and craving are not self.
ai-mn148:11.1_0: If anyone says, ‘the ear is self’ ...
ai-mn148:11.5_0: ‘the mind is self,’ that is not tenable.
ai-mn148:11.6_0: The arising and vanishing of the mind is evident,
ai-mn148:11.7_0: But my arising and vanishing is evident, ‘the arising is evident, this is its vanishing.’
ai-mn148:11.10_0: So the mind is not self.
ai-mn148:12.2_0: The arising and vanishing of thoughts is evident,
ai-mn148:12.3_0: But my arising and vanishing is evident, ‘the arising is evident, this is its vanishing.’
ai-mn148:12.6_0: So the mind is not self.
ai-mn148:13.2_0: The arising and vanishing of mind consciousness is evident,
ai-mn148:13.3_0: But my arising and vanishing is evident, ‘the arising is evident, this is its vanishing.’
ai-mn148:13.6_0: So the mind, thoughts, mind consciousness, and mind consciousness are not self.
ai-mn148:14.2_0: The arising and vanishing of mind contact is evident,
ai-mn148:14.3_0: But my arising and vanishing is evident, ‘the arising is evident, this is its vanishing.’
ai-mn148:14.6_0: So the mind, thoughts, mind consciousness, and mind contact are not self.
ai-mn148:15.1_0: If anyone says, ‘feeling is self,’ that is not tenable.
ai-mn148:15.2_0: The arising and vanishing of feeling is evident,
ai-mn148:15.3_0: But my arising and vanishing is evident, ‘the arising is evident, this is its vanishing.’
ai-mn148:15.6_0: So the mind, thoughts, mind consciousness, mind contact, and feeling are not self.
ai-mn148:15.7_0: If anyone says, ‘craving is self,’ that is not tenable.
ai-mn148:15.8_0: The arising and vanishing of craving is evident,
ai-mn148:15.9_0: But my arising and vanishing is evident, ‘the arising is evident, this is its vanishing.’
ai-mn148:15.12_0: So the mind, thoughts, mind consciousness, mind contact, feeling, and craving are not self.
ai-mn148:16.1_0: Now, mendicants, this is the way that leads to the origin of identity.
ai-mn148:16.2_0: You regard the eye like this: ‘This is mine, I am this, this is my self.’
ai-mn148:17-21.5_0: craving like this: ‘This is mine, I am this, this is my self.’
ai-mn148:17-21.10_0: mind ... thoughts ... mind consciousness ... mind contact ... feeling ... craving like this: ‘This is mine, I am this, this is my self.’
ai-mn148:22.1_0: But this is the way that leads to the cessation of identity.
ai-mn148:22.2_0: You regard the eye like this: ‘This is not mine, I am not this, this is not my self.’
ai-mn148:23-27.5_0: craving like this: ‘This is not mine, I am not this, this is not my self.’
ai-mn148:23-27.10_0: mind like this: ‘This is not mine, I am not this, this is not my self.’
ai-mn148:23-27.15_0: craving like this: ‘This is not mine, I am not this, this is not my self.’
ai-mn148:28.1_0: Eye consciousness arises dependent on the eye and sights. The meeting of the three is contact. Contact is a condition for what is felt as pleasant, painful, or neutral.
ai-mn148:28.2_0: When they experience pleasant feeling they approve, welcome, and keep clinging to them.
ai-mn148:28.3_0: the underlying tendency to greed under him.
ai-mn148:28.4_0: When they suffer painful feeling, they sorrow and wail and lament, beating their breast and falling into confusion.
ai-mn148:28.5_0: the underlying tendency to repulsion underlies.
ai-mn148:28.6_0: And when they experience neutral feeling, their origin, ending, gratification, drawback, and escape.
ai-mn148:28.7_0: with the underlying tendency to ignorance about him.
ai-mn148:28.8_0: Because they’ve given up ignorance and given rise to painful feelings, they wouldn’t experience painful feelings.
ai-mn148:29-33.5_0: Mind consciousness arises dependent on the mind and thoughts. The meeting of the three is contact. Contact is a condition for the arising of what is felt as pleasant, painful, or neutral.
ai-mn148:29-33.6_0: When they experience pleasant feeling they approve, welcome, and keep clinging to them.
ai-mn148:29-33.7_0: the underlying tendency to greed under him.
ai-mn148:29-33.8_0: When they suffer painful feeling, they sorrow and wail and lament, beating their breast and falling into confusion.
ai-mn148:29-33.9_0: the underlying tendency to repulsion underlies.
ai-mn148:29-33.10_0: And when they experience neutral feeling, their origin, ending, gratification, drawback, and escape.
ai-mn148:29-33.11_0: with the underlying tendency to ignorance about him.
ai-mn148:29-33.12_0: Because they’ve given up ignorance and given rise to painful feelings, they wouldn’t experience painful feelings.
ai-mn148:34.1_0: Eye consciousness arises dependent on the eye and sights. The meeting of the three is contact. Contact is a condition for what is felt as pleasant, painful, or neutral.
ai-mn148:34.2_0: When they don’t look forward to enjoying pleasant feeling they don’t swallow it.
ai-mn148:34.3_0: his underlying tendency to greed does not lie within them.
ai-mn148:34.4_0: When they suffer painful feelings they don’t sorrow or wail or lament, beating their breast and falling into confusion.
ai-mn148:34.5_0: underlying tendency to repulsion does not underlies.
ai-mn148:34.6_0: When they experience neutral feeling, they truly understand feelings’ origin, ending, gratification, drawback, and escape.
ai-mn148:34.7_0: underlying tendency to ignorance, the underlying tendency to ignorance does not lie within that.
ai-mn148:34.8_0: It’s simply impossible for them to give up greed, desire, fondness, thirst, passion, and ignorance.
ai-mn148:39.1_0: Mind consciousness arises dependent on the mind and thoughts. The meeting of the three is contact. Contact is a condition for what is felt as pleasant, painful, or neutral.
ai-mn148:39.2_0: When they don’t look forward to enjoying pleasant feeling they don’t swallow it.
ai-mn148:39.3_0: his underlying tendency to greed does not lie within them.
ai-mn148:39.4_0: When they suffer painful feelings they don’t sorrow or wail or lament, beating their breast and falling into confusion.
ai-mn148:39.5_0: underlying tendency to repulsion does not underlies.
ai-mn148:39.6_0: When they experience neutral feeling, they truly understand feelings’ origin, ending, gratification, drawback, and escape.
ai-mn148:39.7_0: underlying tendency to ignorance, the underlying tendency to ignorance does not lie within that.
ai-mn148:39.8_0: It’s simply impossible for them to give up greed, desire, fondness, thirst, passion, and ignorance.
ai-mn148:40.1_0: Seeing this, a learned noble disciple grows disillusioned with the eye, sights, eye consciousness, eye contact, feeling, and craving.
ai-mn148:41.2_0: the nose, smells, tastes, touches, and thoughts.
ai-mn148:41.3_0: They are repelled by the ear ... nose ... tongue ... body ...
ai-mn148:41.4_0: body, touches, body consciousness, and touches.
ai-mn148:41.5_0: mind, thoughts, mind consciousness, mind contact, feeling, and craving.
ai-mn148:41.6_0: Being repelled, they become desireless. Because they are desireless, they are freed. When they are freed, they know they are freed.
ai-mn148:41.7_0: They understand: ‘Rebirth is ended, the spiritual journey has been completed, what had to be done has been done, there is no return to any state of existence.’”
ai-mn148:41.8_0: This is what the Buddha said.
ai-mn148:41.9_0: Satisfied, the mendicants were happy with what the Buddha said.
ai-mn148:41.10_0: And while this discourse was being spoken, the minds of sixty mendicants were freed from defilements by not grasping.
ai-mn148:41.11_0: The sixth section on the group of six is finished.
